# publicID

**Instance Property**

The public identifier of the external entity referenced in the XML document.

## Declaration

```swift
var publicID: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

You may access this property once a parsing operation has begun or after an error occurs.

## Obtaining Parser State

- **columnNumber**: The column number of the XML document being processed by the parser.
- **lineNumber**: The line number of the XML document being processed by the parser.
- **systemID**: The system identifier of the external entity referenced in the XML document.
